nodes.bodyText: No access modifier to make it package-protected
I think this ought to be in the ParameterValue class. ParameterValue.fromParameterValueResponse() makes sense.
Use this. to indicate local members. Particularly useful in constructor implementations.
Implement a setter that matches the getter you choose to implement.
Should the getter take a boolean?
Is this used anywhere? If not lets remove it. And also change the setter to accept boolean so it matches the getter.
